body_html: The shape of the tf.add(...) tensor returned from the body seems to be confusing / not invariant. Do instead x = tf.add(...); x.set_shape(...); return index+1, x in your body and it should work.
body_text: The shape of the tf.add(...) tensor returned from the body seems to be confusing / not invariant. Do instead x = tf.add(...); x.set_shape(...); return index+1, x in your body and it should work.
body: The shape of the tf.add(...) tensor returned from the body seems to be confusing / not invariant. Do instead x = tf.add(...); x.set_shape(...); return index+1, x in your body and it should work.
